main event: There were a number of white, blue, yellow, and orange objects seen in the sky over Portland Mills, Indianapolis on May 8, 1962. The objects appeared to be traveling at a high speed and disappeared from view.
interesting points: The objects were described as being white, blue, yellow, and orange in color.
The objects were observed by a number of witnesses.
The objects were observed for about 10 minutes.
There is no evidence of any physical evidence available.
The objects were seen traveling toward the northeast and then disappeared from view.
sighted object: white, blue, yellow, and orange objects
